department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: This amendment 001 is raised to extend the solicitation period from 27 January 2023 to 13 February, 2023. Please see attached Amendment Documentation.",
duration_in_months: If the bid is awarded to the vendor, then the duration will be 2 years. Additional years can be added at the supplier's discretion.
full_summary:
### Government Contract Announcement: Armoured Transport Services

#### Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada is inviting proposals for a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for Armoured Transport Services. This solicitation is an open bidding process, and suppliers may submit an offer for one or multiple regions of service.

#### Background

Canada's Seized Property Management Directorate (SPMD) has a requirement to establish a NISO for Armoured Transport Services on an "as and when" required basis. The services may include transportation of goods for secure transport, including cash or valuables, on Canadian soil.

#### Solicitation Details

*   Solicitation Reference Number: SPMD-22-ARMOUR-B
*   Solicitation Status: Open
*   Tender Closing Date: 
*   Regions of Service: Maritime Atlantic, Eastern Central, Western Central, and Pacific regions
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Documents Attached to the SOLICITATION
